title: How to restore the deleted data from my formatted SD cards - Quora

response.answer_text: Formatting is a process of preparing a data storage device for use, data storage like a hard disk drive, USB flash drive or memory card, etc. It deletes the existing data and information stored on the SD card and assigns a new file system to the device. When you get a new storage device it is pre-formatted and is ready to use. It also helps to remove any errors related to the Sd card. However, sometimes by mistake, we end up deleting data. Can you restore deleted data from a formatted SD card? Yes. Restoring deleted data from the formatted SD card is possible. The restoration depends on whether or not the SD card has been overwritten. All you have to do is use recovery software and start the scanning process to get your data back. SD card file recovery after formatting is possible with Recoverit recovery software. This powerful software has effective data restoration techniques that can restore data from a formatted SD card. With this software, you can recover all types of files. Before getting started with recovery, you need to connect the external device (SD Card) to your computer. Make sure that the card is recognized or detected. It is 3 steps based recovery process: Select: Select the device as the target location. And then click on the "Start" button to start. Scan: An all-around scan will be launched on the external storage media. Wait a few minutes the scanning is completed. Recover: Once the scanning ends, you can preview the files from the scanning result. To get the files back, click on the "Recover" button and save them to a safe location.

The best software for recovering data from formatted memory card is RecoverIT.
